pages.text: A {b fruit platter} contains and displays items, especially fruits. You can use shift + right-click to take or lay items at where you point to.

Specially designed models are displayed by fruit platters when holding fruits. Items without pre-defined models would be displayed as item models. You may also force a fruit stack to be displayed as item models.

Fruit Platters can be configured to display the items within as a pile with all the items stacked together, or laid separately in quardrants. This difference in the display layout would also result in different shift-click behaviors.
